alert.note: Alert for Bucks (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 11:35PM EDT until July 03 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN HUNTERDON...WESTERN MERCER AND EAST CENTRAL BUCKS COUNTIES... At 1135 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over New Hope, or 13 miles northwest of Trenton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Trenton, Ewing, Pennington, New Hope, Yardley, Hopewell, Stockton, Washington Crossing, Lawrenceville, Woodside, Morrisville and Lambertville. This includes Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 70 and 76. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
